fields.name: Organisation code
fields.description: A unique code to identify an organisation, preferably a Linked Data URI. Local authorities can search for theirs here: http://uris.opendata.esd.org.uk and is likely to be from http://opendatacommunities.org or ONS http://tinyurl.com/onsgeog

fields.name: Effective date
fields.description: Date at which theï¿¼information provided is true. The UK date format (dd/mm/yyyy) should be used.

fields.name: Total occasions fraud powers
fields.description: Number of occasions organisation used powers under the Prevention of Social Housing Fraud (Power to Require Information) (England) Regulations 2014, or similar powers.

fields.name: Total fraud employees count
fields.description: Total number of employees undertaking investigations and prosecutions of fraud.

fields.name: FTE fraud employees count
fields.description: Total full time equivalent numbers of employees undertaking investigations and prosecutions of fraud.

fields.name: Total fraud specialists count
fields.description: Total number of professionally accredited counter fraud specialists

fields.name: FTE fraud specialist count
fields.description: Total full time equivalent numbers of professionally accredited counter fraud specialists.

fields.name: Fraud spent amount
fields.description: Total amount spent by the authority on the investigation and prosecution of fraud.

fields.name: Total investigated fraud
fields.description: Total number of fraud cases investigated.

fields.name: Total identified fraud
fields.description: Total number of occasions on which fraud was identified.

fields.name: Value fraud
fields.description: Total monetary value of the fraud that was detected.

fields.name: Value fraud recovered
fields.description: Total monetary value of the fraud that was recovered.

fields.name: Total investigated irregularities
fields.description: Total number of cases of irregularity investigated.

fields.name: Total identified irregularities
fields.description: Total number of occasions on which an irregularity was identified.

fields.name: Value irregularities
fields.description: Total monetary value of the irregularity that was detected.

fields.name: Value irregularities recovered
fields.description: Total monetary value of the irregularity that was recovered.
